about_the_game:
In Glutenberg you are one of those previleged who have access to the Glue10 technologie, it allows you to combine different parts the way you want to create functionning - or not - vehicules, to complete simple missions and may be pass the Glutenberg Eng. Program™ and get regonized for your real value.

Gameplay:


- Buy parts of different shapes and features.
- Build vehicules by assembling parts in real time with maximal freedom.
- Drive your rolling or flying or floating creations.
- Complete challenges and timed trading deliveries to earn credits.
- Explore Glutenberg island.
- Creative mode to try ideas and designs.

Game Modes:


- Normal: Earn credits buy completing challenges and timed trading deliveries, buy parts to build your vehicules.
- Creative: Build your vehicules for free, all parts are available to make your dream vehicule at no cost.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 3.5Ghz / Intel Core i3-6300 3.8Ghz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.0Ghz / Intel Core i7-6700 3.4Ghz (or better)
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 290 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Create and control physics-based vehicles and structures with total freedom to win the Glutenberg challenges.
